text: On ci az amvol [-i xud, ki ʙa qasd]-i riʙo ʙa mardum medihed, to [ʙo pas giriftani on ʙa mizoni ʙestare ʙar amvolaton] afzun gardad, nazdi Alloh taolo afzois namejoʙad, va[-le] on ci ʙaroi xusnudii Alloh taolo [ʙa unvoni] zakot mepardozed, [ʙarakatu afzois mejoʙad] va [kasone, ki cunin mekunand] inonand, ki podosason [nazdi Alloh taolo] cand ʙaroʙar megardad
